Overview
SCU_ModuleSystemClocks_CLK001 App

Overview

CLK001 App provides UI option to configure the System Clock Source and option to enable/gate the Peripheral module clocks in the core domain. Please refer to the App Configuration Documentation section for details.

Limitations

  • Currently the App allows selection of 12 MHz external crystal.
  • Desired frequency limited to combo box range.
  • There are no APIs provided to reinitialize the System Clock at run time.
